channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Food litter on road, 15th January
item.description:
Rice on road opposite 39 Colls Road. I'm worried it will attract rats.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coll's Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large pot holes., 15th January
item.description:
2 very large pot holes just past the junction of Upperton Road and Chislehurst Road. Anytime a bus or large vehicle, lorry’s etc go through it, out flat (The Elms on the corner of Upperton) shakes and I am starting to worry about it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chislehurst Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large box which has been dumped, 15th January
item.description:
Box been there for weeks. Assuming its got stuff in it as the bin men wont take it!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Well Hall Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5 bags of fly tipped rubbish, 15th January
item.description:
Following the removal of fly tipping in this spot yesterday thank you there are another 5 black plastic sacks dumped on the end of the bus shelter between the junction of Westwood Lane and Yorkland Avenue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Lane, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 15th January
item.description:
Blocked
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Claydown Mews, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken tarmac where DPD van drive into it, 15th January
item.description:
Broken tarmac around the post appears may have moved an inch where DPD delivery driver crashed into it no driver in the vehicle at the time jumped out of electric van in the middle of road to deliver parcels and did not ensure his vehicle was safely positioned or brakes on. I have the registration number if you would like it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Betts Close, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Centre of road large hole appeared dangerous for vehicles tyre's, 15th January
item.description:
This has appeared here in the last week or so
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Lane
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burst water pipe near corner of Spurgeon Rd and Beulah Hill, 15th January
item.description:
A water pipe under the road/curb has been leaking for almost a week, resulting in a substantial hole in the road that is getting bigger by the day. It’s filled with water so passing traffic splashes pedestrians

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Beulah Hill, Upper Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road breaking up side of speed bump, 15th January
item.description:
This has been here for over 2 weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road

item.title: Massive pothole, 15th January
item.description:
Whole road is terrible and they’re constantly closing the road for works but there’s no difference. When coming towards the roundabout on the left hand side of the road there is a massive pothole
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned untaxed vehicle Merrilees Road Sidcup, 15th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Longlands, Greater London

item.title: Number or pot holes, 15th January
item.description:
Pot holes and metal edges of drains exposed. They have been evenent for months and are getting worse. Drain at junction with Russell Road and Ormonde Rise. Go up Russell Road from there and see a number or large pot holes and junction with Westbury road. Also main road Roding lane, near junction with Rous Road. Take a look, they are all very dangerous

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive puddle, 15th January
item.description:
Wet wet wet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenoaks Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: West Heath Road near the top going uphill towards pond., 15th January
item.description:
This is the biggest pothole i have ever seen, my car literally fell sideways, in fact it is not a pothole it is more of a sinkhole, caused damage to my car, please fix immediately!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Heath Road, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken manhole cover on pavement, 15th January
item.description:
The manhole cover on the pavement in front of 67F Crystal Palace Park Road is broken. It is currently temporarily covered with a large concrete slab, which frequently becomes loose. This creates a significant safety risk, with potential for someone to fall into the manhole. The issue has been present for several weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crystal Palace Park Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Rymans, 15th January
item.description:
Has been here all day. Not in proper cycle bay and has damaged lights so not legal. I reported to lime and they have done nothing
